title: Keeps It Simple — Calendar / Scheduling Tools
description: Use this gate when you want a calendar experience that stays clean and basic.
A tool fails if it adds heavy automation, task layers, or planning features that create extra decisions.
Pick the option that feels like “just a calendar” rather than a productivity system.

tools.name: Motion
tools.note: Adds automated planning/scheduling layers beyond basic event viewing.

tools.name: Akiflow
tools.note: Task + calendar blending adds extra interface decisions.

tools.name: Clockwise
tools.note: Optimization/automation introduces settings and moving parts.
